snippet.title: Impossible Mission (2007) - PlayStation 2 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Everyone knows Epyx's C64 classic Impossible Mission, but most probably didn't know that there was an enhanced version made in collaboration with System 3. This PS2 remake contains both the original game, the modern version, merged mode (which combines both OG and Modern modes) and a tutorial.

Also released on PlayStation Portable, Ninendo DS, Nintendo Wii and PlayStation 3 (as a PS2 Classic on the EU PlayStation Store)

#impossiblemission #ps2 #playstation2 #retrogames #retrogaming #epyx
